title: Elden Ring Is A MASSIVE Sales Success - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.15.22
description:
Tam and Lucy breakdown June 2022's NPD details, God of War Ragnarok Pre-Orders, Fall Guys latest issues, and more!

Follow Lucy: https://twitter.com/LucyJamesGames

Follow Tam: https://twitter.com/TamoorH

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:11:10 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Podcast: An Airing of Gregvances is live right now: youtube.com/kindafunny and podcast services.
Today Greg, Joey, SnowBikeMike, and Xbox are in LA! They’re taking over the Fonda Theater in Hollywood for the As Dusk Falls Launch Event, if you managed to RSVP for it don’t forget to go, and have fun!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Gordon McGuire,& Al Tribesman
The Roper Report  -
00:13:08 - PS officially acquires Bungie
00:24:30 - June 2022 NPD Details – Mat Piscatella
00:33:30 - After Just 5 Months, Elden Ring Is Among The Best-Selling Games Of All Time In The US – Eddie Makuch, GameSpot
00:41:20 - Ad
00:44:30 - Unity CEO Says You're A "F***ing Idiot" If You Don't Think About Monetization During Creative Process, Apologizes - Demi Williams, GameSpot
00:51:50 - God Of War Ragnarok Preorders Are Now Live, Including Jotnar Edition – Steven Petite and Jon Bitner, GameSpot
00:54:50 - Out today
00:55:55 - You‘re Wrong
